thread.title: Rex Tillerson will meet with Russia's foreign minister | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Rex Tillerson will meet with Russia's foreign minister | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Rex Tillerson will meet with Russia's foreign minister | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Rex Tillerson will have his first meeting with Russia's foreign minister TOMORROW in the wake of new claims about the links between the Kremlin and Trump's aides Secretary of State Rex Tillerson will meet with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov in Germany during his first trip abroad as America's top diplomat The meeting comes in the wake of reports Trump's aides have links with Russia A report on Tuesday alleged that aides were in contact with Russian intelligence officials during the year leading up to the presidential election The Kremlin said on Wednesday that the report was not based on any facts Tillerson's meeting with Lavrov will give the Kremlin a chance to grasp what Washington, DC, is now thinking and where this may lead Published: 12:46 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 14:45 GMT, 15 February 2017 108 shares
